#stream table
"stream * from music"
{
  "QueryType": "STREAM",
  "Original": "stream * from music",
  "Instructions": {
    "OperatorType": "MessageStream",
    "Keyspace": {
      "Name": "user",
      "Sharded": true
    },
    "TargetDestination": "ExactKeyRange(-)",
    "Table": "music"
  }
}
